docs.text: Welcome to the homepage of Weitian Xing I am currently a 1st-term MASc student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering in University of Waterloo , my advisor is Prof. Werner Dietl . Find me at: Github / Linkedin Education From January to April 2019, I was a MEng student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering in University of Waterloo , I was also a research assistant working with Prof. Werner Dietl . From September to December 2018, I was a MEng student in the department of Systems Design Engineering in University of Waterloo . From September 2014 to June 2018, I studied in the department of Electronic Information Science and Technology and received my B.S. from Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications . Research Interest I am currently working on pluggable type systems. Industry Experience From April to June 2018, I interned at Nanjing Guiji Zhineng Technology Co., Ltd. as a Python R&D Engineer. From October 2017 to January 2018, I interned at Nanjing Walkyren Network Technology Co., Ltd. as a Backend Developer. Projects To be released. Click here to see a complete list of projects. Contact Me Click here to see the contact information.
